name: Those Goddamn Sheep!
description:
TESTED ON CHROME AND MS EDGE

Ludum Dare #34 compo entry
made under 48 hours by jellycube

Rules are simple:
1. White sheep eat flowers
2. Planting flowers gives you money
3. Bullets cost you money
4. Black sheep chase you and deal damage
5. Shoot THOSE GOD DAMN SHEEP!

LMB - shoot, RMB - plant flower
W,A,S,D - run

Have fun folks!

I'm working on new version of the game. It'll be much more fun with new graphics and content. Please consider donating - so much coffee is needed! :D
